name: SnoBlo
description:
A game where you must stop a tree from falling while stopping the snow from building up!

If the tree falls or too much snow piles up, game over!

Use   the A and D  keys to move. Left Click to activate the blower. Aim with the mouse.

If you're on the same side as the tree, it pushes it twice as hard!

Programming, Concept,    and Art by Carter Shipes.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Jingle Bells" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
